Title: Getting to Ground
Description:
He needs to be healed--now. 

We're too out in the open here. Sundered Flame loyalists could ambush us at any time. 

Let's find cover somewhere so we can assess his wounds.

Cover me!
ObjectivesText: Get Marithos to safety in the Azure Span.

Objectives.Text: Escort Amythora and Marithos to safety
